javavis.jip2d.base.bitmaps
Class JIPBmpShort

java.lang.Object
  javavis.jip2d.base.JIPImage
      javavis.jip2d.base.bitmaps.JIPImgBitmap
          javavis.jip2d.base.bitmaps.JIPBmpShort
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class JIPBmpShort
extends JIPImgBitmap

Class to manage SHORT type images. The data is byte [0..65535] Short type uses the short primitive type of Java which stores the data in two complement, When using the Double methods, a value between 0..65535 will be returned. When using the getPixel method, a byte value -32768..32767 will be returned, being -32768 equals to 65535

See Also:
